main event: A sighting of a round object described as resembling 'Rango Balls' occurred in Springfield, Ohio on July 27, 1948.
interesting points: The object was reported to be traveling north at a height consistent with astronomical phenomena., The object was described as having a red tail and traveling in a straight line., The sighting lasted a short time, which aligns with characteristics of a meteor., The description suggests that the object could be classified as a brill meteor due to its distinctive traits., The sighting occurred late at night around 10 PM.
sighted object: a round object resembling Rango Balls
